mapper.insert: insert into CC_TICKETS (ID, FIELD_NUM, SUBJECT, CONTENT_TYPE, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_CELLPHONE, ORGANIZATION_ID, ASSIGNEE_ID, ASSIGNEE_NAME, ASSIGNEE_AVATAR, USER_GROUP_ID, USER_GROUP_NAME, TEMPLATE_ID, PRIORITY, STATUS, STATUS_EN, PLATFORM, SATISFACTION, TAGS, CREATOR_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, SOLVING_AT, RESOLVED_AT, CLOSED_AT, SOLVED_DEADLINE, REPLIED_AT, AGENT_REPLIED_AT, CUSTOMER_REPLIED_AT, REPLIED_BY, CONTENT, CUSTOM_FIELDS, FOLLOWERS) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fieldNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{assigneeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{assigneeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assigneeAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userGroupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{satisfaction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solvingAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resolvedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solvedDeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repliedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentRepliedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerRepliedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repliedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{customFields,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{followers,jdbcType=CLOB})
mapper.update: update CC_TICKETS set FIELD_NUM = #{fieldNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT_TYPE = #{contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_CELLPHONE = #{userCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ASSIGNEE_ID = #{assigneeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ASSIGNEE_NAME = #{assigneeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGNEE_AVATAR = #{assigneeAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_GROUP_ID = #{userGroupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USER_GROUP_NAME = #{userGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPLATE_ID = #{templateId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_EN = #{statusEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATFORM = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SATISFACTION = #{satisfaction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAGS = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOLVING_AT = #{solvingAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOLVED_AT = #{resolvedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLOSED_AT = #{closedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOLVED_DEADLINE = #{solvedDeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPLIED_AT = #{repliedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_REPLIED_AT = #{agentRepliedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_REPLIED_AT = #{customerRepliedAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPLIED_BY = #{repliedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB}, CUSTOM_FIELDS = #{customFields,jdbcType=CLOB}, FOLLOWERS = #{followers,jdbcType=CLOB} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, FIELD_NUM, SUBJECT, CONTENT_TYPE, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_CELLPHONE, ORGANIZATION_ID, ASSIGNEE_ID, ASSIGNEE_NAME, ASSIGNEE_AVATAR, USER_GROUP_ID, USER_GROUP_NAME, TEMPLATE_ID, PRIORITY, STATUS, STATUS_EN, PLATFORM, SATISFACTION, TAGS, CREATOR_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, SOLVING_AT, RESOLVED_AT, CLOSED_AT, SOLVED_DEADLINE, REPLIED_AT, AGENT_REPLIED_AT, CUSTOMER_REPLIED_AT, REPLIED_BY, CONTENT, CUSTOM_FIELDS, FOLLOWERS from CC_TICKETS where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select ID, FIELD_NUM, SUBJECT, CONTENT_TYPE, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_CELLPHONE, ORGANIZATION_ID, ASSIGNEE_ID, ASSIGNEE_NAME, ASSIGNEE_AVATAR, USER_GROUP_ID, USER_GROUP_NAME, TEMPLATE_ID, PRIORITY, STATUS, STATUS_EN, PLATFORM, SATISFACTION, TAGS, CREATOR_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, SOLVING_AT, RESOLVED_AT, CLOSED_AT, SOLVED_DEADLINE, REPLIED_AT, AGENT_REPLIED_AT, CUSTOMER_REPLIED_AT, REPLIED_BY, CONTENT, CUSTOM_FIELDS, FOLLOWERS from CC_TICKETS
